content: Great list! Thanks for putting this together. I feel it’s so important to focus on remembering what we gained from previous years in order to grow and prosper in the years to come. It’s crucial for the industry to learn from the past in order to succeed in the future. I think you’d enjoy my recent blog post-http://spectechular.walkme.com/my-top-6-favorite-product-management-articles-i-discovered-on-medium-this-month/, I compiled a list of my favorite articles I came across last month on Medium. Enjoy!
